code: import React from"react";import{Grid}from"@mui/material";import YellowTheme from"@assets/images/icons/yellow-theme.svg";import WhiteTheme from"@assets/images/icons/white-theme.svg";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{THEME}from"../../../../../constants";import{useTranslation}from"@helpers/translate";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Theme=_ref=>{let{open,setOpen}=_ref;const{theme}=useSelector(state=>state.theme);const dispatch=useDispatch();const{__}=useTranslation();const changeTheme=theme=>{dispatch({type:THEME.CHANGE_THEME,payload:theme});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"desc-change-theme ".concat(open?"active":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>setOpen(false),className:"desc-change-theme__bg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"desc-change-theme__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"desc-change-theme__title",children:__("common.theme_type")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:"6px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"button",className:"desc-change-theme__btn ".concat(theme==="orange"?"active":""),onClick:()=>changeTheme("orange"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("picture",{className:"desc-change-theme__btn-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:YellowTheme})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"desc-change-theme__text",children:__("common.dark")})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"button",className:"desc-change-theme__btn ".concat(theme==="white"?"active":""),onClick:()=>changeTheme("white"),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("picture",{className:"desc-change-theme__btn-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:WhiteTheme})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"desc-change-theme__text",children:__("common.light")})]})})]})]})]});};export default Theme;
